characters.name: Randolph, the town drunk
characters.description: He's a drunken vagrant. He has excellent handwriting.
characters.speech: *drunkenly* I think I need to find myself another drink. And maybe somewhere to relieve myself. And not necessarily in that order.

characters.name: a talking horse
characters.description: I'm not sure what you expect me to say. It's a talking horse.
characters.speech: I'm a talking horse. And I haven't got a thing to say...

characters.name: a portly child
characters.description: Someone's parents should lock up the sweets.
characters.speech: I'm looking for candy. Also, there's an interdimensional portal in the basement of the saloon.
